name: spo-copy-hubsite-navigation
title: Copy a hub navigation from a source site to any desired target hub site
shortDescription: This script copies a hub navigation from any hub site (source) to another hub site (target)
longDescription: This script copies a hub navigation from any hub site (source) to another hub site (target). Use this script to create a consistent hub navigation for all your sites in SharePoint Online.

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
